Blog.post: Saturday I'm supposed to go to Nashville shores but I also have my church directory pictures that day. Curse my need to multitask
wendsday night Brandon is going to my church! yay!

Friday i went to beach bend and had the time of my life!!! we went on every ride at least twice (even the kidie rides)! i had a great time. i went on the "Star Ship 3000", and i tried to stand on the wall while it was moving and fell and got a concusion! Woohoo! it was fun though!

i'm having a b-day party Friday! I can't wait. were going to beach bend. my brother,koty, is going and so is my neice, Lauren G., my niphew, Matt G., my friends lauren, coty, & T, and my neice's boyfriend, greg, and my brother's friend, Ant. last time i went there was about 4 or 5 years ago. well, g2g. bai bai.
My boyfriend, Brandon, called me on monday to wish me a happy birthday. it was very sweet. i think he may be "the one". I know i love him but i'm very confused if i'm in love with him.

i fell in gym yesterday. i was going after a ball and slid on my knees and one started bleeding real bad. the funny part is i didn't realize it was bleeding until a prepy looked at my knee and went,"Ewwww",and threw up. i couldn't stop laughing.

My pal drew is getting locked up for a week because he violated his probation by not following directions at school. I dont know why he was on probation but i know it was somthing VERY bad that he did.
I just found out that I'm going to Texas in July. I get to see my great-grandpa! very exciting. my brother is coming too. He's taking his skate board to help me with some of my tricks.
i've been going to VBS at my church the past couple of days. I'm in one of the plays! i feel special!:)

Brandon and i are back together! I am sooooooooo happy! Tomorow, we are meeting in front of the scho......, scho......., sorry still in summer mode. We are meeting in front of that big bilding where where we learn stuff. lol. But anyways, I can't wait till Chrismas (my mom's getting me a bass)! Well, TTFN. bb, bye
